On Aug 5, 2010, at 4:13 PM, Eric J. Bowman wrote:

> What on Earth REST constraint is being violated by boolean checking if
> a resource exists

You cannot boolean-check whether the resource exists.

(404 does not mean that the resource does not exist)

Jan
